text: 'What a frightful event!' he wrote. 'I tremble! What infatuation! Personally I am. indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, tho' I cannot but that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen...
